items.description: Available only to residences, condominiums, mobile homes or individually metered apartments, irrespective of the source of energy for environmental space conditioning of water heating, subject to the Cooperative's current Energy Conservation Rate Requirements. Rate 420 is available to those members who complete an agreement pursuant to the Cooperative's Pre-Paid Meter Program. Rate 720 is available to those members who have completed an interconnection agreement regarding the Cooperative's Net Metering Program.
items.energycomments: The Cooperative's Wholesale Power Cost Adjustment Schedule PCA will apply to all service supplied under this rate schedule.
items.name: Rate Codes 20, 420, and 720 Single-Phase
items.utility: Broad River Electric Coop, Inc (North Carolina)
